description: Don’t be fooled by the relatively simple ambience of this trattoria which is situated in the centre of a town with an interesting history linked to the reclamation of the marshes and the dairy industry. Dedicated to the owner’s two grandmothers, the restaurant serves some of Sardinia’s best-known meat and fish specialities.
